name: @cira/infrastructure
description: AWS CDK infrastructure definitions for invoice processing system

scripts.build:app: npm run -w @cira/database build && rm -f ../../dist/.tsbuildinfo && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:app && cdk deploy --context environment=dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build:app && cdk deploy --context environment=staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:app && cdk deploy --context environment=prod
scripts.migrate:dev: bash -c "ARN=$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name CiraInvoice-Api-dev --region us-east-1 --query \"Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey=='DbMigrateFunctionArn'].OutputValue\" --output text) && aws lambda invoke --function-name \"$ARN\" /tmp/out.json --log-type Tail --query LogResult --output text | base64 --decode"
